definition: dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
Bitter Cauliflower, 1954 socialist realist novel by Feng Deying 馮德英|冯德英[Feng2 De2 ying1] loosely based on Maxim Gorky's Mother, made into a 1967 film by Li Ang

sentences.english: In the springtime, yellow rape sead flower blossomed everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 在春天，到處開的都是黃色的油菜花。

sentences.english: Nyingchi in spring. The land becomes a sea of blossoming rape plants.
sentences.chinese: 林芝的春天，油菜花盛開的田野。

sentences.english: Divide the cauliflower into florets and wash them thoroughly.
sentences.chinese: 把菜花掰成一塊塊小花，然後仔細把它們洗乾淨。

sentences.english: Cauliflowers are very cheap at the moment.
In late spring, the flowers of rape are blossoming wildly, alluring swarms of butterflies.
sentences.chinese: 暮春的油菜花一片放肆，粉蝶轟轟其上。

sentences.english: Then, the old man bought our a lot of cauliflower with 1.5 yuan a pile.
sentences.chinese: 結果，老頭用1塊5角錢買走了我們的一大堆菜花。

sentences.english: These bumps are usually cauliflower looking and could be seen in small clusters.
sentences.chinese: 這些碰撞通常是尋找和菜花中可以看到一小羣。

sentences.english: Golden rape flower in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 金黃的油菜花在風中搖曳。

sentences.english: Yellow flower of rape always remind me of my childhood in the countryside.
sentences.chinese: 黃黃的油菜花總使本人想起本人在鄉村時的童年。

sentences.english: If you have seen Little Big Soldier , you will understand why canola flowers are so important in the movie.
sentences.chinese: 如果你們看過《大兵小將》就會明白油菜花的意義。

sentences.english: Observation of the wild rapeseed pollen grains under the scanning electron microscope.
sentences.chinese: 新疆昭蘇野生油菜花粉形態掃描觀察。

sentences.english: The field is full of cole flower.
She bought a cauliflower and some carrots.
sentences.chinese: 她買了一個菜花和一些胡蘿蔔。

sentences.english: They are looking for a boy named He Cong.
sentences.chinese: 何輔，一個叫菜花的女孩正在大門口等你。

sentences.english: Our cauliflower is so good, why fear nobody buy?
sentences.chinese: 我們的菜花這麼好，還怕沒人買？

sentences.english: When will I send my rose and cauliflower ?!
sentences.chinese: 我的玫瑰和菜花什麼時候會送出呢？

definition: oilseed rape (Brassica napus)/flowering edible rape (Brassica chinensis var. oleifera)
eggplant (Solanum melongena L.)/aubergine/brinjal/Guinea squash/phonetic "cheese" (when being photographed)/equivalent of "say cheese"
variant of 卷心菜[juan3 xin1 cai4]
Manchurian wild rice 菰[gu1], aka water bamboo, or its edible stem, which resembles a bamboo shoot
